rows.translation: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
For the protection of the Qureaish--
Their protection during their trading caravans in the winter and the summer--
So let them serve the Lord of this House

rows.arabic: ٱلَّذِىٓ أَطْعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٍ وَءَامَنَهُم مِّنْ خَوْفٍۭ
rows.translation: Who feeds them against hunger and gives them security against fear.
rows.transliteration: alladhī aṭ`amahum min jū`in wa-āmanahum min khawf
